ygData.subject: Re: Xegony Daily
ygData.msgSnippet: ... and hopefully a bard mask. We went in last night and got both! I didn t know a kylong bp dropped, never seen one, although it makes sense with bracers,
ygData.messageBody:
Brilinia wrote:

> Darkfox - We were actually after the Procurator for a key to South
and hopefully a bard mask. We went in last night and got both! I
didn't know a kylong bp dropped, never seen one, although it makes
sense with bracers, arms, and legs dropping. I have the Trak bp so
it's doubtful I would be interested in a kylong bp.

I was joking about the Breastplate, hehe, I figured you were there
for the Mask. :)

We've seen about 3 of the BP's while actually looking for Masks (2 in
1 night :/) and they pretty much suck. They're not horrendous, but
they're chain based and anyone who can wear it that's hunting in the
West Wing of HS more than likely has something better. Oh, and
they're NO DROP, so it can't even make a nice parting gift to whoever
doesn't win anything all night!

Congrats on getting your mask the next time around. :)

Gaelthorne, I was thinking the same thing, heh, first time actually
running in to you face to face. And yes, the Boss of the West Wing
drops the Mask of Obtenebration, the Kylong BP, and rumored to be
some nice weapon, although I've never encountered that. Then again,
the Procurator is also rumored to spawn, and some nights I've had a
hard time believing that. :)

Darkfox
